import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Header from './layout/Header'; import Footer from './layout/Footer'; import BuildForm from './containers/BuildForm'; const SassGenerator = variables => { return ( `${ variables.primary ? `$primary: ${variables.primary};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.secondary ? `$secondary: ${variables.secondary};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.bgName ? `$name: ${variables.bgName};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.bgColor ? `$bg: ${variables.bgColor};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.enableInverse ? `$enable-inverse: ${variables.enableInverse};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.enableDarken ? `$enable-darken: ${variables.enableDarken};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.enableLighten ? `$enable-lighten: ${variables.enableLighten};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.enableContrast ? `$enable-contrast: ${variables.enableContrast};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.enableTrans ? `$enable-trans: ${variables.enableTrans};` : ''}`.trim() + `${ variables.enableGray ? `$enable-gray: ${variables.enableGray};` : ''}`.trim() + `@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/index';`.trim() + `${variables.components === "all" ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/all';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.select2 ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/select2';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.datepicker ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/datepicker';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.navbar ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/navbar';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.carousel ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/carousel';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.alert ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/alert';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.badge ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/badge';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.breadcrumb ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/breadcrumb';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.buttonGroup ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/button-group';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.buttons ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/buttons';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.card ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/card';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.code ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/code';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.customForms ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/custom-forms';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.forms ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/forms';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.dropdown ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/dropdown';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.inputGroup ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/input-group';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.jumbotron ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/jumbotron';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.listGroup ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/list-group';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.media ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/media';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.modal ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/modal';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.nav ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/nav';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.pagination ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/pagination';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.popover ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/popover';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.progress ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/progress';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.tables ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/tables';" : ""}`.trim() + `${variables.tooltip ? "@import 'node_modules/wi-framework/bootstrap/components/tooltip';" : ""}`.trim() ) } class BuildTool extends Component { submitHandler = values => { console.log(SassGenerator(values)); } render() { return (

Build Tool

) } } export default BuildTool;
